attributes.additional_details: Theresa May our unelected prime minister fought hard as Home Secretary to foist this bill upon the people without success. When this bill was being debated the commons was virtually empty, such an important issue should have the chamber full, just like when MP's expenses where debated. This is not democracy and we're taking it back!!
attributes.background:
We the people didn't not ask for our civil liberties to be restricted, but we have with the snoopers charter by stealth.
The opposition failed to put up any opposition, and we the people are speaking up for this insidious law to be debated properly and hopefully repealed.
